Ancestry-Kholo -- Male Witch Kholo Fighter
Strength: +2 Dexterity: +3 Constitution: +1 Intelligence: +2 Wisdom: +0 Charisma: +1
Background: Hermit Deity: Nethys
Experience: 323/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 7/12
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Dog Kholo: Has 30' Speed on all fours
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Class; Skill Selectable Feature Count: Fighter (Key Attribute); Kholo (Heritage)
Feats: Absorb Strength; Affliction Resistance; Ambush Hunter; Ancestor's Rage; Ask The Bones; Bonekeeper's Bane; Breath Like Honey; Crunch; Distant Cackle; First To Strike, First To Fall; Grandmother's Wisdom; Hyena Familiar; Impaling Bone; Kholo Lore; Kholo Weapon Familiarity; Laughing Kholo; Left-Hand Blood; Legendary Laugh; Pack Hunter; Pack Stalker; Rabid Sprint; Right-Hand Blood; Sensitive Nose; Terrain Stalker (Underbrush); Vicious Swing Fighter Features: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons); Attribute Boost (Strength); Attribute Boosts; Class Trained (Fighter); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense); Fighter Feats; Fighter Key Attribute; Fighter Skills; Perception Expert; Reactive Strike; Save Expert (Fortitude; Reflex); Save Trained (Will); Shield Block; Strength Hermit Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Constitution, Intelligence; Choose 1 from any); Dubious Knowledge; Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Nature, Occultism; Choose 1 from any Terrain Lore) Kholo Features: Ant Kholo; Attribute Boost (Strength; Intelligence; Choose 1 from any); Attribute Flaw (Wisdom); Bite; Cave Kholo; Dog Kholo; Great Kholo; Kholo Heritage; Low-Light Vision; Sweetbreath Kholo; Winter Kholo; Witch Kholo
Feature Notes:
Ant Kholo: Has the Small feature
Cave Kholo: Has the Darkvision feature
Fighter Feats: Class Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Hyena Familiar: Has the Familiar feature
Kholo Heritage: 1 selection
Kholo Lore: Has the Additional Lore (Kholo Lore) feature
Laughing Kholo: Has the Battle Cry feature
Pack Stalker: Skill Feat (Choose 1 from any Terrain Stalker)
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Familiar: Has a Tiny animal minion
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Pack Hunter: +2 to Aid and to allies' checks to Aid self
Perception: +5 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +3 (dexterity; untrained) Dragon Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +1 (charisma; untrained)
Aquatic Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Halfling Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +0 (wisdom; untrained)
Arcana: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +1 (charisma; untrained) River Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +5 (strength; trained) Kholo Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Society: +2 (intelligence; untrained)
Crafting: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +0 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +8 (dexterity; expert)

Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Kholo Lore): Skill Trained (Kholo Lore)
Ant Kholo: Skill Trained (Deception)
Breath Like Honey: Has increased Sweetbreath Kholo effects
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 5 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Kholo Lore: Skill Trained (Stealth; Survival)
Sweetbreath Kholo: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Ambush Hunter: Can Scout and Avoid Notice simultaneously
Ant Kholo: +1 Deception to claim innocence and +1 Deception DC vs. Sense Motive to notice lies about innocence
Ask The Bones: (F) Gains +1 to Recall Knowledge if the source of possessed bones knew the topic well once per day
Dubious Knowledge: Normal failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Pack Stalker: Can extend Terrain Stalker effects to 1 ally within 10'
Right-Hand Blood: Suffers 1 HP slashing to gain +1 on Administer First Aid or 2d8 HP slashing to gain +1 on Treat Disease or Treat Wounds
Sensitive Nose: Has 30' imprecise scent
Sweetbreath Kholo: +2 to Make An Impression when breath can be smelled
Terrain Stalker (Underbrush): Sneaking 5' in underbrush at least 10' from foes requires no Stealth check
Witch Kholo: +1 to Create A Diversion or Impersonate using voice
Combat
Hit Points: 21 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (2 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (strength; trained)
Armor: Hide Shield: None Weapons: Greatpick (+7 1d10+2 P [Crit d12]; strength; expert); Jaws (+7 1d8+2 P; strength; expert); Mambele (+7 1d6+2 S [Crit +d8] R20'; strength; expert); Sawtooth Saber (+6 1d6+2 S; dexterity; trained); Sling (+8 1d6+1 B R50'; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Bite: Jaws inflict 1d6 HP piercing
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Crunch: Jaws inflict 1d8 HP
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Great Kholo: +2 Hit Points
Kholo Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Kholo Weapons; Flail; Khopesh; Mambele; War Flail)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Absorb Strength: (1) Consuming a piece of a foe's fresh corpse gives temporary Hit Points equal to the foe's level for 1 min once per hr
Ant Kholo: +1 initiative when using Deception
Battle Cry: Can use Demoralize as a free action on a foe during initiative
Bonekeeper's Bane: Adjacent foes suffer -1 attacks and skill checks once per foe per day (save Will negates)
Crunch: Jaws have the grapple trait
First To Strike,First To Fall: Successful Strike in the 1st round on a foe that hasn't acted inflicts off-guard until the end of the next turn; reducing the foe to 0 Hit Points by the end of that turn gives self and allies within 30' an extra Step, Stride, or Strike until the end of the following turn
Great Kholo: +1 Athletics to Reposition, Shove, or Trip
Kholo Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon kholo weapons
Laughing Kholo: Suffers no Demoralize penalty for lacking a shared language
Left-Hand Blood: (1) Suffers 1 HP slashing to enhance a weapon to inflict 1d4 HP persistent poison on the next hit before the end of the next turn once per hr
Legendary Laugh: Can Demoralize targets up to 60' away, and success inflicts 3d8 HP mental, or 6d8 HP on a critical success
Rabid Sprint: (2) Strides on all fours 3 times
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Vicious Swing: (2) Melee Strike inflicts 1 extra damage die and counts as 2 Strikes for the multiple attack penalty
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +3 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Affliction Resistance: +1 vs. disease and poison, and successes vs. disease and poison are critical successes
Winter Kholo: Has cold resistance 1 and treats environmental cold as 1 step less extreme
Magic
Attack: Occult Innate: +4 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult Innate: 14 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Animal Form (O2): (2) Self becomes a Medium animal with 5 temporary Hit Points, Armor Class 17, +9 attack, +1 damage, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +9 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 3rd gives 10 temporary Hit Points, Armor Class 18, +14 attack, +5 damage, +14 Athletics; 4th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary Hit Points, Armor Class 19, +16 attack, +9 damage, +16 Athletics; 5th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary Hit Points, Armor Class 19, +18 attack, +7 damage with double damage dice, +20 Athletics)
Augury (O2): (10 min) Successful DC 6 GM flat check reveals whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be generally good or bad
Enthrall (O3): (2) Fascinates creatures within 120' while sustained, with additional saves for disagreement (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure allows no further saves)
Figment (OC1): (2) R30' Creates a simple illusory sound or vision, giving a +2 bonus to Create A Diversion, while sustained
Impaling Spike (O5): (2) R30' Inflicts 8d6 HP piercing from cold iron and immobilized (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and off-guard) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Ventriloquism (O1): (2) Allows self to project their voice up to 60' for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects last for 1 hr, allow changing voice quality, and require an active Perception to attempt to disbelieve)
Magic Notes:
Ancestor's Rage: Knows the Animal Form occult innate spell; can cast it at 5th rank once per day to become a canine
Breath Like Honey: Knows the Enthrall occult innate spell; can cast it at 3rd rank once per day with a range of 30'
Distant Cackle: Knows the Ventriloquism occult innate spell; can cast it at 1st rank once per day
Grandmother's Wisdom: Knows the Augury occult innate spell; can cast it at 2nd rank twice a day
Impaling Bone: Knows the Impaling Spike occult innate spell; can cast it at 7th rank once per day for a bone spike that affects both corporeal or incorporeal targets
Witch Kholo: Knows the Figment occult innate cantrip; can cast it at will
Notes
